Text: Wortham is an historic manor within the parish of Lifton in Devon, England.

4:
--------------------
Text: Wortham, Lifton:  John Dynham (d.1641) was the last in the male line and married Margaret Harris (d.1650), a daughter of Arthur Harris (1561-1628) of Hayne in the parish of Stowford and lord of the manor of Lifton, both in Devon, and of Kenegie in the parish of Gulval in Cornwall, Sheriff of Corwall in 1603 and Captain of St Michael's Mount, Cornwall.

Triplets:<John Dynham
5:
--------------------
Text: Wortham, Lifton:  Arthur Harris's grandfather John Harris (d.1551) of Hayne, a Serjeant-at-Law and Recorder of Exeter, had purchased the manor of Lifton from the Nevile family, Earls of Northumberland.
Triplets:<John Harris
